metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28089 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Tor before 0.4.5.7 allows a remote participant in the Tor directory protocol to exhaust CPU resources on a target, aka TROVE-2021-001.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28089` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.3.2.10-1ubuntu0.2~esm2
tor-geoipdb - 0.3.2.10-1ubuntu0.2~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tor package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.2.10-1ubuntu0.2~esm2').
